document.heading: Renewable Energy Portfolio Standard Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-245, the “Renewable Energy Portfolio Standard Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-418. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2014, and December 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 26, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-595 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-245 became effective April 30, 2015.
